desc: Pawfume's grooming & wellness solutions are made for healthier dogs & happier humans. Created by the nation's top veterinarians & loving dog parents, Pawfume's products provide the finest quality care. All products are hypoallergenic, sulfate free, alcohol free and made with premium, eco-friend ingredients in the USA.

layout.text: DOGS GET STINKY, ITCHY & DIRTY... SOMETIMES
